languages.text: {n}Акулья улыбка возникает на лице Владайма, кровавая и злобная.{/n} "В местах, где я вырос, это называется "отправить на круг". Человеку вырезают на лбу определенный знак, а затем живьем заряжают в трубу выброса шлака и отправляют на орбиту станции. Раз в тридцать лет мы чистим орбиту и считаем, сколько покойников с чьими знаками летает вокруг станции. Как же я хочу отправить этих мелких ублюдков на круг, как в старые добрые".

traits.locale_text: {n}Акулья улыбка возникает на лице Владайма, кровавая и злобная.{/n} "В местах, где я вырос, это называется "отправить на круг". Человеку вырезают на лбу определенный знак, а затем живьем заряжают в трубу выброса шлака и отправляют на орбиту станции. Раз в тридцать лет мы чистим орбиту и считаем, сколько покойников с чьими знаками летает вокруг станции. Как же я хочу отправить этих мелких ублюдков на круг, как в старые добрые".
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."
languages.original_text: {n}Акулья улыбка возникает на лице Владайма, кровавая и злобная.{/n} "В местах, где я вырос, это называется "отправить на круг". They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute and send them to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how I want to send those little scamps to the circle like in the good old days."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは、残忍で凶悪なサメのような笑い顔を浮かべる。{/n}「私が育ったところでは、”ポイッとしてぐるぐる”と言う言葉がある。人間の額に印になるサインを刻み、生きたまま溶融廃棄物シュートに積み込んで、ステーションの周回軌道に送り出すんだ。30年ごとに軌道の後片付けをして、どのサインを持った死体が何体漂っているか数える。私が古き良き時代のように、あの取るに足らない輩達をどれほどぐるぐるさせたいか、君には分からないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは、残忍で凶悪なサメのような笑い顔を浮かべる。{/n}「私が育ったところでは、”ポイッとしてぐるぐる”と言う言葉がある。人間の額に印になるサインを刻み、生きたまま溶融廃棄物シュートに積み込んで、ステーションの周回軌道に送り出すんだ。30年ごとに軌道の後片付けをして、どのサインを持った死体が何体漂っているか数える。私が古き良き時代のように、あの取るに足らない輩達をどれほどぐるぐるさせたいか、君には分からないだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆脸上露出了嗜血而狠毒的笑容，仿佛鲨鱼一般。{/n}“在我长大的地方，那里的人有种说法，叫‘把别人丢到星环上’。意思是，他们会在那个人额头上刻上某个特殊的标记，之后把他丢进废渣处理槽里活活绞碎，再把那些碎渣丢到落脚港的行星轨道。每隔三十年，我们都会清理行星轨道，数数轨道上有多少个带着那种标记的东西。您恐怕想象不到，我有多想把那群小无赖丢到星环上，就像过去的好日子那样。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."

traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: {n}En el rostro de Vladaym aparece una sonrisa de tiburón, sangrienta y despiadada.{/n} «En mi barrio lo llaman "mandar a alguien de paseo". Graban una señal en la frente de la víctima, la cargan viva en el conducto de desechos mecánicos y la ponen a orbitar en torno a la estación. Cada treinta años, limpiamos la órbita y contamos cuántos fiambres han estado flotando por ahí y qué señal llevaban. No sabe las ganas que tengo de mandar a esos rufianes de paseo como en los viejos tiempos».
languages.original_text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."

Graban una señal en la frente de la víctima, la cargan viva en el conducto de desechos mecánicos y la ponen a orbitar en torno a la estación. Cada treinta años, limpiamos la órbita y contamos cuántos fiambres han estado flotando por ahí y qué señal llevaban. No sabe las ganas que tengo de mandar a esos rufianes de paseo como en los viejos tiempos».
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: {n}Un sourire de requin, sanguinaire et cruel, apparaît sur le visage de Vladaym.{/n} « Là où j'ai grandi, il y a une pratique que l'on appelle "envoyer quelqu'un au rebut". On lui grave un signe bien distinct sur le front, puis on le jette vivant sur le toboggan d'élimination des déchets et on l'envoie en orbite autour de la station. Tous les trente ans, nous nettoyons l'orbite et comptons le nombre de cadavres qui flottent en les classant par signe. Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point j'ai envie d'envoyer ces petits minables au rebut, comme au bon vieux temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire de requin, sanguinaire et cruel, apparaît sur le visage de Vladaym.{/n} « Là où j'ai grandi, il y a une pratique que l'on appelle "envoyer quelqu'un au rebut". On lui grave un signe bien distinct sur le front, puis on le jette vivant sur le toboggan d'élimination des déchets et on l'envoie en orbite autour de la station. Tous les trente ans, nous nettoyons l'orbite et comptons le nombre de cadavres qui flottent en les classant par signe. Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point j'ai envie d'envoyer ces petits minables au rebut, comme au bon vieux temps. »
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: {n}Vladaym lächelt wie ein Hai, blutig und bösartig.{/n} "Wo ich herkomme, nennt man das 'jemanden in die Bahn werfen'. In die Stirn einer Person wird ein bestimmtes Zeichen geschnitten, dann wird sie lebend in einen Schlackemüllschlucker geworfen und in den Orbit um die Station geschossen. Alle dreißig Jahre säubern wir die Umlaufbahn und zählen, wie viele Leichen mit welchen Zeichen dort umhertreiben. Ihr könnt Euch nicht vorstellen, wie gerne ich diese kleinen Schurken in die Bahn werfen würde, genau wie in den guten alten Zeiten."
languages.original_text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."

Ihr könnt Euch nicht vorstellen, wie gerne ich diese kleinen Schurken in die Bahn werfen würde, genau wie in den guten alten Zeiten."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzünde köpek balığınınkine benzer kanlı ve hırçın bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Büyüdüğüm yerde 'evrenin kaç bucak olduğunu göstermek' diye bir gelenek vardı. Adamın alnına bir işaret kazır, sonra da canlı canlı cüruf boşaltma bacasına tıkıp istasyonun yörüngesine yollarlardı. Otuz yılda bir yörüngeyi temizleyip hangi işaretten kaç ceset olduğunu sayardık. O haydutlara eski günlerdeki gibi bucak saydırmayı ne kadar çok istediğimi bilemezsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}A shark-like smile appears on Vladaym's face, bloody and vicious.{/n} "Back where I grew up, they call it 'throwing someone for a loop.' They carve a particular sign on the person's forehead, then load them alive into the slag disposal chute, and send them out to orbit the station. Every thirty years, we clean the orbit and count how many stiffs bearing which signs have been floating around. You have no idea how much I want to throw those little thugs for a loop like in the good old days."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzünde köpekbalığına benzer kanlı ve hırçın bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Büyüdüğüm yerde buna 'dünyanın kaç bucak olduğunu göstermek' derlerdi. Adamın alnına bir işaret kazır, sonra da canlı canlı bertaraf bacasına atıp istasyonun yörüngesine gönderirler. Otuz yılda bir yörüngeyi temizleyip hangi işaretten kaç ceset olduğunu sayardık. O haydutlara eski günlerdeki gibi bucak saydırmayı ne kadar çok istediğimi bilemezsin."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege
